result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mitchell Rivera

records.addlTxt: Atty Moore unable to appear for 10/31 PTC - rescheduled to 11/22 9am.  Attys emailed this day.   Atty Moore to notify DE.

Defendant, Mitchell Rivera, appeared with Attorney Adrienne Michelle Moore.  Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.  Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.

01:18 PM   Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.   Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Adrienne Moore.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Bond continued posted w/ same conditions (see bond entry). DE waives time for the preliminary hearing. mi

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on July 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

02:24 PM    Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes: Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm..   Bond continued as previouly set/ (see previous bond entry). SPD has not been appointed counsel for DE. DE waives time for preliminary hearing. rb
Status conference on June 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant, Mitchell Rivera, appeared.   Intern Daniel Bernard Deida with Attorney Alexander Huber appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
DE has new file, STC is canceled in this file and PH is scheduled fro 04-21 at 10:15am.  DA notified on the record.
Status conference on May 18, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant, Mitchell Rivera, appeared.  Attorney Zachary L Brost appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE is attempting to retain private counsel.    DE waives time for preliminary hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *No Weapons especially firearms or edged weapons,  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Kayla M.  The DE may make arrangements with a party or law enforcement to retrieve personal property and/or medication from the victim's  Kayla M residence within 24 hours of signing the bond in this case.  The DE may not be the party retrieving any property and/or medication.

114PM    Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Kristyne Watson.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on April 7, 2022 at 08:45 am.  $1000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  ts
and witness list filed by the State
